name: Epic Pro 2d Egg Surfing Video Game
name_original: Epic Pro 2d Egg Surfing Video Game
description: become epic egg gamer. use wasd and space bar to move and jump, or the left and right arrows to move, and the up arrow to jump. The images were found online. I also used a lot of tutorials for the code. I am noob coder. If its named something different on the title screen, that's because I probably forgot the name of it. And, the name of the godot project is different, because I didn't have a name for it at the time.
